law.catch_line: Temporary suspension or modification of statutory provisions due to conflict with provisions of budget bill.
law.text: To the extent that the provisions of a budget bill are in conflict with any provisions of KRS Chapters 12, 42, 56, 152, 177, or 341, the provisions of those chapters are hereby suspended or modified. Such suspension or modification shall not extend beyond the duration of the budget bill.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 410, sec. 7, effective July 1, 1984.
